item.title: NYC Mayor Adams Fires Staffer for 'Karma' Kirk Remark
item.description: New York Mayor Eric Adams fired an employee in his administration this week for calling the death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk "karma."

item.title: 23 GOP Reps Seek Probe of 'Radical Left' After Kirk Murder

item.title: Giuliani to Newsmax: US Public Schools Teach 'Hatred of America'
